channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ready for a Market Surprise?
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Investor sentiment often says more about politics than price action. In today’s chart, you’ll see how bullish expectations shift based...

item.title: These Traders are Deranged
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Investor sentiment often says more about politics than price action. In today’s chart, you’ll see how bullish expectations shift based...

item.title: What I See Coming Next for the Market
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Yesterday’s market action told a clear story—steady gains in the morning, followed by a sharp reversal after Trump’s fiery message abo...

item.title: This is Signaling More Gains Ahead
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I just pulled a chart that compares investor sentiment to how close the S&P 500 is to all-time highs—and the gap right now is striking...

item.title: Don’t Get Scared Out of the Market
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I’ve gone back through decades of data to see how the S&P 500 performed after major geopolitical shocks - everything from Pearl Harbor...
